title: Housing Statistics for Scotland - Key Information and Summary Tables
description: A range of key housing information and summary tables for Scotland and local authority area. Table 1-Estimated stock of dwellings by tenure - calendar year time series from 1993 to 2000 and financial year time series from 2001-02 to 2016-17, at Scotland level. Table 2-Estimated stock of dwellings by tenure and local authority, most recent year only.
notes: Information from Housing Statistics Annual Returns, and Scottish Household Survey data. Note the change in methodology from 2001, fully explained in the notes in the downloadable excel file
